modules.description: This module implements a WebSocket client connection over Lwt with support for asynchronous I/O operations. It works with file descriptors and handles WebSocket handshake configuration, including nonce, host, port, and resource parameters. Concrete use cases include establishing secure WebSocket connections with custom error and message handlers for real-time communication.

Handles incoming WebSocket connections by creating a connection handler that processes client requests. It works with Unix domain sockets and file descriptors, managing WebSocket data streams using the `Httpun_ws.Wsd` type. This function is used to set up per-connection input handling for WebSocket clients, allowing custom logic to be applied to messages received from specific clients.

This module provides functions for building WebSocket servers and clients using Lwt and Unix domain sockets. It handles WebSocket handshakes, message processing, and connection management with support for asynchronous I/O and custom client-specific logic. Concrete use cases include real-time communication systems and inter-process communication over WebSockets.
